name: Make it Red
description:
Tap on shapes to make it red.
We wanted to create a totally unique puzzle/strategy game that was easy to use, difficult to master and fun to play.
Make It Red is the result.

The goal is to make all the shapes red by tapping on them. However, when you tap on a shape it changes the color of the shapes next to it. Makes it interesting, huh!?

There are 20 unique levels for you to solve. They start easy and get harder. If you like solving logic puzzles, this app is perfect for you.
OR you can randomly tap on shapes to Make it Red!

*** How the game works ***
The goal is to make all the shapes red. This is done by tapping on the shapes.

When you tap a grey shape, it will change to red.
When you tap a yellow shape, it will change to grey.
When you tap a red shape, it will change to yellow.

However, tapping a shape makes the shapes around it change color!
If the surrounding shape color is grey, it will change to yellow.
If the surrounding shape color is yellow, it will change to red.
If the surrounding shape color is red, the shape will change to grey.

It sounds way more complicated than it is! Honest!
